amendment.description: To require medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs to share certain data with State cancer registries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1116 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1116 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Kelly to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To require medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs to share certain data with State cancer registries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1116 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1116 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Kelly to Amendment SA 1092.
